### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper plate factory at position (0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position (0.0, 0.0)) with coal as fuel and currently processing copper ore into copper plates.

### Copper plate mine at position (-28.5, -61.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position not specified) for extracting copper ore.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors related to furnace operation
- Ensure that the furnace has the necessary ingredients to smelt before inserting items. Check the inventory of the furnace to confirm available resources.
